attributes.action: Action should be taken against Blair for unnecessarily invading Iraq.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2016/jul/06/iraq-inquiry-key-points-from-the-chilcot-report

The report is accessible here : http://www.iraqinquiry.org.uk/the-report/
attributes.background:
The Chilcot report have concluded that Blair's decision to invade Iraq was totally wrong . His accusation of Iraq having mass destruction and biological weapons was invalid according to the UN inspectors . 
They went ahead with the invasion despite the largest protest event in human history .
